intro: Welcome to bris.tk, the quickest way to check the weather forecast for any place in the world. The forecast is highly accurate.
contactCont: If you would like to contact us you can do it on any of the adresses below:
noscript: This page relies on javascript. Please enable javascript in your browser if you want to use the website.
cookiePolicy: This website uses cookies to track pageviews and saves data locally to reduce page load time
fetchFail: We were unable to fetch weather-data. This may be a temporary error, or your location may not be supported. The issue has been reported and will most likely be resolved soon.
metCredit: Based on weather data from MET Norway
rotateTip: Tip! Turn your device into landscape mode to view more weather data
